ShannonsController - Interface in network
ShannonsController.java: This interface controls the ShannonsModel class.
ShannonsJScrollBarPanel - Class in network
ShannonsJScrollBarPanel.java: This class extends JPanel and uses JScrollBar as a GUI for bandwidth, signal to noise and maximum data rate.
ShannonsJScrollBarPanel(ShannonsController) - Constructor for class network.ShannonsJScrollBarPanel
Constructor which has an object from the ShannonsController class as an argument.

Constructor which has an object from the ShannonsController class as an argument.
ShannonsJTextFieldPanel - Class in network

Constructor which has an object from the ShannonsController class as an argument.
ShannonsModel - Class in network
ShannonsModel.java: This class creates a small calculator using the ShannonsTheorem, which requires a bandwidth value and a signal to noise value in order to return the maximum data rate using the appropriate calculation for this result.
ShannonsModel() - Constructor for class network.ShannonsModel
Default constructor of the class ShannonsModel.
ShannonsTheorem - Class in network
ShannonsTheorem.java: This class creates a small calculator using the Shannons Theorem, which requires a bandwidth value and a signal to noise value in order to return the maximum data rate using the appropriate calculation for this result.
ShannonsTheorem() - Constructor for class network.ShannonsTheorem
Default constructor of the ShannonsTheorem class.
ShannonsView - Class in network
ShannonsView.java: Class that extends JFrame and implements Observer.
ShannonsView() - Constructor for class network.ShannonsView
Default constructor.
